full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG GI NYAMS LEN ZAB GNAD KYI SMON LAM RIM PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (CES PADMA DBANG CHEN GYI RGYUD @007A *, ,KYI DGONGS PA BZHIN DPAL RTA MGRIN GYI NYAMS LEN RIM PA'I ZAB GNAD THAMS CAD MA TSANG BA MED PAR BSDUS NAS SMON LAM GYI RIM PA BYA TSUL 'DI YANG, MDO STOD SGOM SDE'I SA GNAS RAB 'BYAMS PA SMRA BA RIN CHEN 'OD ZER GYIS BSKUL TE, PADMA DBANG CHEN GYI RNAL 'BYOR DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB KYIS SER BYES BLA BRANG DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,RGYAL BSTAN RIN CHEN DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, ,'GRO KUN BDE SKYID DPAL SPYOD PA'I PHYIR, ,BSOD NAMS KUN BSDUD GLING GI BLA BRANG NAS, ,CHOS SBYIN 'DZAD MED GANGGA'I RGYUN 'DI SPEL, ,BSOD NAMS RGYAS LA YUN RING RGYAS GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
